thread.title: Annnnd we’re off! WaPo already ‘pushing fake news’ on Melania Trump
thread.title_full: Annnnd we’re off! WaPo already ‘pushing fake news’ on Melania Trump

author: Sarah D.
title: Annnnd we’re off! WaPo already ‘pushing fake news’ on Melania Trump
text:
Donald Trump’s only been president for a few hours, but media aren’t wasting any time rediscovering their adversarial role. Newly minted First Lady Melania Trump is at the top of their list: White House website promotes Melania Trump's modeling and jewelry line https://t.co/Vxv4RO2MlQ 
— Matea Gold (@mateagold) January 20, 2017 
What? That’s outrageous! 
It’s also not even remotely accurate. This is what @mateagold calls "promoting Melania Trump's clothing and jewelry line"– which are no longer available. It's her bio, ffs. pic.twitter.com/J1JyrvPgGa 
— Sheik Yerbouti (@YerboutiSheik) January 20, 2017 
Call us crazy, but we fail to see anything shady there. And we’re definitely not alone: @mateagold @washingtonpost It's a bio. You're a half-wit. 
— The Mental Recession (@rustyweiss74) January 20, 2017 @mateagold It's called a "bio" you nitwit
